name: Kamran Hadad
title: Full Stack Developer
bio: ÙŒWith 18 years of experience in programming and team and individual projects, I design custom software using the latest tools and technologies with a business intelligence (BI) approach for banking, commerce, production, and livestock and poultry industries. Additionally, I'm passionate about developing web applications using technologies such as React and Node.js and I enjoy exploring new technologies. I love creating web applications and I take pleasure in exploring new technologies.
